attributes.action: Hold a referendum regarding Britains EU membership status
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is time that we, the British people, have the opportunity to state our views on the European Union and the membership of this country. We appear to be the only country abiding by the EU rules and this is to our detriment. We need to regain control of our country and its affairs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
